name: Hexagon Defense (itch) (Nether Yoshi)
description:
Hello! Welcome to Hexagon Defense.

Hexagon Defense is a simple arcade shooter game where you just have to rotate the hexagon and shoot. It features an innovative play style that doesn't exist anywhere else. There are also various items you can use to slaughter the enemies! 

This game does its best in killing some time, so be sure to download it on your phone in case you need it :)

Features
- Innovative play style: rotate the hexagon and shoot the enemies!
- Variety of stages with different themes and difficulty!
- Infinite mode: challenger your potential and survive the longest time!
- Addictive music
- Compete with users worldwide with Google Play Games!*
- All content can be unlocked for free.
